main event: A single bright object with a light glow was reported in Kerrville-Valverde, Texas on October 9, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was described as being the size of a pen., The object was reported to have a bright glow., The object was concluded to probably be a meteor based on its description and speed., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigations conducted by the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: one bright object with a light glow
